EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2019-01-09 Takeaways on Gartner Conference 2018.ES 1 - SL 2 - Segment A
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Gartner Cloud Strategies 2018 Recap
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4ppAAA]]>
Register Now and Enter to Win $100 Amazon Gift Card <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4ppAAA]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Struggling to summarize all of your learnings from this year's Gartner Cloud Strategies conference? Looking for a refresh on the conference highlights as you transition into 2019? Turbonomic has you covered. Join our Gartner Cloud Strategies 2018 Takeaways Webinar <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4ppAAA]]> on Wednesday, January 9th at 11 a.m. ET.
Register Now <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/wbn-gartner-conference-2018/?utm_campaign=70157000001j4ppAAA]]>
During the 30-minute live webinar, we'll discuss:
- The top announcements from Gartner Cloud Strategies 2018 - What they mean for you and your team - What to expect in 2019
All registered guests will be entered to win a $100 Amazon Gift Card. I hope to see you there! Regards, Andrew
